comments.body: Nit: there should be no space before `:`. Same a few lines below.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +54,58 @@   * @return A Future object to manage the task scheduled.
   */
  def schedule(name: String, fun: ()=>Unit, delay: Long = 0, period: Long = -1, unit: TimeUnit = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS) : ScheduledFuture[_]
}
